taskDescription: Drag the words into the correct boxes
resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
textField:
Satisfied with your products and services = *Loyal Customers*
The more on discount the more they will spend = *Discount Customers*
Difficult to satisfy = *Need Based Customers*
If they find it of interest they will pick it up and buy it = *Implusive Customers*
Visit the shop regularly = *Loyal Customers*
Less in numbers = *Loyal Customers*
Could be lost if not engaged with positive interaction = *Need Based Customers*
Promotes more sales and profit than other customers = *Loyal Customers*
Least profitable = *Wandering Customers*
Are habitual buyers = *Need Based Customers*
Wants individual attention = *Loyal Customers*
You should show them reason to switch to other products = *Need Based Customers*
Only buy specific products that they need = *Need Based Customers*
Regular visitors but only buy product that are on special or are of low cost = *Discount Customers*
Not particularly looking for a product = *Impulsive Customers*
Not sure what they want to buy = *Wandering Customers*
